summary.description:
Guide Subspace Learning for Unsupervised Domain Adaptation.

Guided Subspace Learning(GSL demo).

In the file, there are multiple .m files.

NGSL.m : Core codes of NGSL algorithm.

GSL.m : Core codes of GSL algorithm.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'GSL', 'guide subspace learning', 'data-guided', 'UDA'
summary.name: NGSL
